item.title: Articles by Adam Sabin
item.description: Adam is a tech-savvy individual with a degree in computer science.

item.title: Articles by Marvin Kaufman
item.description: Marvin is a seasoned computer science professional with expertise in a wide range of technologies and platforms.

item.title: Articles by John Graham
item.description: John is a digital evangelist and computer scientist with a keen interest in improving cybersecurity and how search engines work.

item.title: Articles by Daniel Gonzales
item.description: Daniel is a self-taught professional in the field of information technology, with a focus on business and IT developments.

item.title: Articles by Willie Dillon
item.description: Willie has always had a strong interest in technology and how it can be used to solve problems and make our lives easier.

item.description: Eli is a computer enthusiast who enjoys building and customizing systems.

item.description: Edward is a specialist in computer and network hardware who loves keeping up with the latest developments in the techÂ industry.
